title: Agricultural Workshops
description: We offer workshops about ecological farming,sustainable agriculture,mushroom farming,composting etcâ€¦

title: Animal Production
description: Visitors can experience dealing with different kinds of animals and practice with them several activities, such as feeding,gazing,egg picking and all necessary product processing.

title: Pick and Eat
description: Visitors can experience picking fresh fruits,vegetables and products in the farm and prepare their unique kind of food.

title: Aquaponics
description: Visitors can have the experience to interact with friendly fish , learn about the basics of aquaponics and to test the existing planted samples.

title: Hydroponics
description: The farm has a high-tech hydroponics system.It produces continuously with very high standards and quality.

title: Camping-Bonfire
description: You are most welcome to have family and friends gatherings around the bonfire, and spend quality time in our space.You can also take a tent, sleep and experience the unique sunrise.

title: Guesthouse
description: Our ecological guesthouse shares interior experience similar to the exterior, with an integration of natural engraved stone with greenery.

title: Guided Tours-Hiking
description: The farm is located beside many hiking trails and beautiful natural scenery, where you can benefit from the support of our local guides.

title: Traditional Healthy Meals
description: You can experience our delicious meals collected originally from the farmland with a wide variety of dishes to meet all tastes and preferences.

title: Agri-Food Processing
description: We offer a variety of organic and healthy agrofood products from our farm produced with love and care to satisfy all your standards

title: Sitting Area-Workplace
description: Our comfortable spaces are always available for anyone interested to work in a natural environment or to spend some relaxing and healthy time.

title: Technical and Agricultural Research
description: Our land will be available for researchers, university student, and agricultural student to have their research done, you can benefits from a detailed explanation about Ecological farming in addition to a calm place to work.
